DOC.brief_summary: The study pilot-test innovative , combine urinary/bowel continence workshop two Wisconsin community . Between 8-15 woman incontinence enrol two pilot community complete three 90-minute workshop session 6 week period .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot : Mind Over Matter : Healthy Bowels , Healthy Bladder
DOC.detailed_description: The pilot study use mixed method compare pre- post-workshop data urinary bowel incontinence symptom care-seeking workshop participant well information workshop acceptability workshop participant community partner . The study expect last 6 month initial IRB approval data analysis workshop revision . This research provide preliminary data large test workshop four diverse Wisconsin Communities , follow randomize , control trial subsequent dissemination research study .
DOC.criteria: qualify symptom 3 month prior enrollment receive new treatment qualify symptom 3 month prior enrollment
